wiki.content:
Chop Suey! is the first single from American heavy metal band System of a Down's second album Toxicity. The single was released in September 2001 and earned the band its first Grammy nomination. The song's working title was "Suicide"; the band members claim the change was not caused by pressure from their record company. The words "We're rolling Suicide" can still be heard faintly in the album versions's opening seconds - though this intro is only on certain pressings of the album. The song is included as a playable track in the music video games Rock Band 2 and Rock Band Unplugged.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Chop Suey! is the first single from American heavy metal band System of a Down's second album Toxicity. The single was released in September 2001 and earned the band its first Grammy nomination. The song's working title was "Suicide"; the band members claim the change was not caused by pressure from their record company. The words "We're rolling Suicide" can still be heard faintly in the album versions's opening seconds - though this intro is only on certain pressings of the album. The song is included as a playable track in the music video games Rock Band 2 and Rock Band Unplugged.

track.name: Chop Suey!
comments: R.I.P. to everyone who died on 9/11/01 .
The piano is such a crucial element to the song [2] it turns a good song into a great one
Still can't believe this one made it onto the radio out here as a single.
One of the better modern hard rock bands
This is the song that made me appreciate all of their other songs.
i remember being in high school and having this as my alarm every morning to "wake up", heroic suicide
The piano is such a crucial element to the song
I first listened to this song on 2003 and it's still awesome... <3
